title: Memberships!
content:
[{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"There are three membership tiers available here on PenX. 

"},{"text":"All tiers include:","bold":true}]},{"type":"p","id":"bb591402-2faa-4772-86c8-7927e55e426d","children":[{"text":"the Newletter"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc"},{"type":"p","id":"ca989b96-565e-4b4f-a09d-91e11f3408ae","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","children":[{"text":"A monthly allocation of $EXOTERIC"}],"listStart":2},{"type":"p","id":"ca4598e2-b752-4442-9be6-ea344a31affc","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":3,"children":[{"text":"Early Registration options for the courses, clinics, classes, and workshops."}]},{"type":"p","id":"3b771bfe-5bc1-4d21-8f01-0f1b6a48c4b9","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":4,"children":[{"text":"Whitelisting for future releases  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"9c177169-2700-4950-b1ee-1c481cfb751b","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":5,"children":[{"text":"Qualification for any airdrops, NFT airdrops, special Members Only Workshops"}]},{"type":"p","id":"6c7508cf-d73c-4a00-acce-d64dbc716dd9","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":6,"children":[{"text":"The ability to schedule 1on1 time with Jack Lhasa and other community members"}]},{"type":"p","id":"a077066a-c767-465c-8c86-cf3c2fb497b0","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":7,"children":[{"text":"You may purchase more than a single month at once  Those that choose to buy for several months at once will receive a special “Supporter” POAP"}]},{"type":"p","id":"0f65f9b6-3990-4e3f-99df-1d22aa65a936","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":8,"children":[{"text":"The option to buy $EXOTERIC "}]},{"type":"p","id":"67e3b56a-21da-4f9d-adbd-0551d225fd5d","children":[{"text":"
"},{"text":"Tier 1 - The Poorest Fan","italic":true}]},{"type":"p","id":"6a73120b-dd60-437d-b8de-e1212c97462c","children":[{"text":"The Incredibly low price of $0.50 USD a month"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc"},{"type":"p","id":"39fcc86f-1cb4-4a27-ab28-a44d1dda9b66","children":[{"text":"A POAP serving as a membership credential"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":2},{"type":"p","id":"76bd2d3f-e5b6-41a0-addb-6c306df9cbe4","children":[{"text":"
"},{"text":"Tier 2 - Dearly Beloved","italic":true}]},{"type":"p","id":"3091b13c-d28d-4d9a-86bb-e0c46c25d0e3","children":[{"text":"The Affordable price of $2.50 USD a month"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc"},{"type":"p","id":"017ce0e8-ae69-4e0f-b15c-59dd2e0fbce7","children":[{"text":"Access to all content that is not course related. "}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":2},{"type":"p","id":"17e30d62-0c91-4439-a4e0-003cb6d20edd","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":3,"children":[{"text":"A monthly “Active Member” POAP"}]},{"type":"p","id":"18485bcd-2131-41a7-a90e-b26afe434653","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":4,"children":[{"text":"The New Year’s Day POAP"}]},{"type":"p","id":"e8e1b9c6-20b7-43de-b006-9c157ae2e4d8","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"b82849a2-abea-4ad0-8c80-8d1670a9860a","children":[{"text":"Tier 3 - The Student Plan","italic":true}]},{"type":"p","id":"8cd92bc7-ac30-45ea-91d9-9a0a3d66276c","children":[{"text":"$8.00 USD per month"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc"},{"type":"p","id":"f00371d2-8b9d-4457-97e8-a24903d4fbca","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","children":[{"text":"Access to all content that is not course related"}],"listStart":2},{"type":"p","id":"56d61a68-d803-439e-af7a-cb694157184c","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":3,"children":[{"text":"An early registration window for classes"}]},{"type":"p","id":"d395958b-0414-4b11-817c-4ce92c14944a","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":4,"children":[{"text":"The New Year’s Day POAP"}]},{"type":"p","id":"5d8e4d4e-c293-4d96-b5b0-270afcea3a15","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":5,"children":[{"text":"Discounts on NFTs"}]},{"type":"p","id":"52338c03-a19d-46f0-80a2-8aadcdba389e","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":6,"children":[{"text":"Discounts on Courses, Workshops, Clinic, and Classes"}]},{"type":"p","id":"6712779c-b7c5-4749-880b-c05c16bfe8b7","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":7,"children":[{"text":"The “Scholar’s” POAP"}]},{"type":"p","id":"328de396-b00b-4774-a35d-fba9387e6ca4","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","listStart":8,"children":[{"text":"Exclusive access to gated content
"}]},{"type":"p","id":"492c8b9d-cb47-4cef-a529-5ac262199e4c","children":[{"text":"That’s the membership rundown!  All memberships will include access to content in the Exoteric multiverse that is not available here on PenX , for example, the Newsletter, and NFTs available on marketplaces across many blockchains."}]},{"type":"p","id":"d38fb98f-bf32-4c43-979c-a1c961351321","children":[{"text":"
When new NFTs are available, there will be a post here, and it will be mentioned in the newsletter.  "}]},{"type":"p","children":[{"text":""}],"id":"d07bf836-07d7-4950-9ed0-27f0f54b4848"},{"type":"p","id":"d79d1598-e04d-4124-96af-27143f74d95a","children":[{"text":"So much more information is on it’s way!"}]},{"type":"p","id":"d31526dc-6b5d-4bb2-a9a3-6d70d4439942","children":[{"text":"Jack Lhasa"}]},{"type":"p","id":"0246fcf0-e4fe-4df9-9fac-78bde637cefe","children":[{"text":"Exoteric","bold":true}]},{"type":"h3","children":[{"text":"Moonshadow","subscript":true}],"id":"1a11f1b6-e172-4add-bc23-64f355933a54"},{"children":[{"text":"01/052025"}],"type":"p","id":"df39566c-2641-4d83-a939-6b52e312cc52"}]
